```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Import

```{r import}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
cali_water_full <- read_csv("data/cali_water.csv")
glimpse(cali_water_full)
```

## Select relevant columns

```{r columns}
colnames(cali_water_full)
```

```{r select_cols}
cali_water <- cali_water_full[ c(1, 5, 6, 9, 20)]

glimpse(cali_water)
```

```{r monthly_full}
library(lubridate)

ylab <- c(7.5, 10, 12.5, 15, 17.5)

cali_water %>%
  group_by(Reporting_Month) %>%
  summarize(water_production = sum(Production_Reported)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Reporting_Month, y=water_production)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x=element_blank(), y="Water production (in billion gallons)") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = paste0(ylab, "B"),
                     breaks = 10^9 * ylab
                     )
```
